00026 /* returns a list of devices for selection, array is name NULL pointer
00027  * terminated and must not be freed */
00028 
00029 typedef struct CCLDeviceInfo {
00030     const char *identifier;
00031     const char *name;
00032     int value;
00033 } CCLDeviceInfo;
